summary: Email correspondence between CBS News reporter Matt Pieper and the Federal Bureau of Prisons Office of Public Affairs regarding a media inquiry about whether Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch while in custody. The BOP provides a link to Attorney General William Barr's statement and declines further comment.

events.description: Officials gave a statement regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, referenced by the reporter as occurring 'yesterday' relative to August 11, 2019.

events.title: Media Inquiry on Suicide Watch

keyFacts: The Federal Bureau of Prisons declined to comment beyond providing Attorney General William Barr's statement on Jeffrey Epstein's death.
A CBS News reporter was actively investigating whether Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch while in BOP custody.
The correspondence confirms public and media scrutiny regarding the circumstances of Epstein's custody and death in August 2019.
